name: event.preventDefault
title: event.preventDefault()
desc: If this method is called, the default action of the event will not be triggered.

examples.desc: Cancel the default action (navigation) of the click.
examples.html: default click action is prevented

entries.longdesc: For example, clicked anchors will not take the browser to a new URL. We can use event.isDefaultPrevented() to determine if this method has been called by an event handler that was triggered by this event.
